raven,

blu-ray isn't what you think it is.
Mainly, it is a disc that can contain larger files (hence the higher resolution)
When people say blu-ray rip, they are giving you a video container file that was ripped from the blu-ray, you do not need a blu-ray player or anything to read a video container file like .mkv .avi .mp4 etc. etc., however, if you get a blu-ray DISC, you will need a blu-ray player.
